TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit EventLogEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogEntry Inherits Component Implements ISerializable
public ref class EventLogEntry sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type EventLogEntry = class inherit Component interface ISerializable

summary.span: 在事件日志中封装单个记录。

span.span: Encapsulates a single record in the event log.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类时，通常不会直接创建 的实例。You usually will not create instances of directly when working with the class. 类的 成员包含 实例的集合，这些实例在通过使用 类索引成员读取时进行循环访问。The member of the class contains a collection of instances, which you iterate over when reading by using the class index member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 在此示例中，`switch` 语句使用控制台输入搜索指定事件类型的事件日志条目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified event type. 如果找到匹配项，则会在控制台中显示日志条目的源信息。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Category As String
public: property System::String ^ Category { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与该项的 属性关联的文本。

span.span: Gets the text associated with the property for this entry.

value.span: 应用程序特定的类别文本。

span.span: The application-specific category text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个应用程序（事件源）可以定义自己的编号类别和它们所映射到的文本字符串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件查看器可以使用类别来筛选日志中的事件。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log.

exception.span: 未能为与类别关联的插入字符串之一分配空间。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CategoryNumber As Short
public: property short CategoryNumber { short get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("An ID for the category of this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取事件日志项的类别号。

span.span: Gets the category number of the event log entry.

value.span: 该项的应用程序特定类别号。

span.span: The application-specific category number for this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个应用程序（事件源）可以定义自己的编号类别和它们所映射到的文本字符串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件查看器可以使用类别来筛选日志中的事件。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log. 类别必须从数字1开始连续编号。The categories must be numbered consecutively beginning with the number 1. 类别号由 属性指定。The category number is specified by the property. 事件查看器可以将类别显示为数值，也可以将类别用作资源标识符以显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Data { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("Binary data associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取与该项关联的二进制数据。

span.span: Gets the binary data associated with the entry.

value.span: 包含与此项关联的二进制数据的字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes that holds the binary data associated with the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将创建一个数组，该数组保存项特定于事件的二进制数据的副本，该副本以十六进制和文本格式组合事件查看器显示。Getting this property creates an array that holds a copy of the entry's event-specific binary data, which the Event Viewer displays in combined hexadecimal and text format. 特定于事件的数据有时用于存储应用程序将独立于事件查看器处理的信息，例如，从日志文件中生成报表。Event-specific data is sometimes used to store information that the application will process independently of the Event Viewer, for example, to make reports from the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EntryType As EventLogEntryType
public: property System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType EntryType { System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType get(); };

span.span: Gets the event type of this entry.

value.span: 与事件日志中的项相关联的事件类型。

span.span: The event type that is associated with the entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有事件类型都有明确定义的通用数据，并且可以选择包括特定于事件的数据。All event types have well-defined common data and can optionally include event-specific data. 每个事件都属于单个类型，应用程序在报告事件时指示该类型。Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event. 事件查看器使用事件类型确定要在事件日志的列表视图中显示哪个图标。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，`switch` 语句使用控制台输入搜索指定 的事件日志条目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到匹配项，则会在控制台中显示日志条目的源信息。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

Public Function Equals (otherEntry As EventLogEntry) As Boolean

summary.span: 对两个事件日志项进行比较。

span.span: Performs a comparison between two event log entries.

returns.span: 如果 对象完全相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the objects are identical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对两个对象执行逐字节的比较。This method performs a byte-by-byte comparison between the two objects. 它不确定两个 实例是否引用同一对象。It does not determine whether the two instances refer to the same object.

summary.span: 获取当前事件项的应用程序特定事件标识符。

span.span: Gets the application-specific event identifier for the current event entry.

value.span: 事件消息的应用程序特定标识符。

span.span: The application-specific identifier for the event message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值表示事件日志中的项的事件标识符，其中顶部两位被屏蔽。This value represents the event identifier for the entry in the event log, with the top two bits masked off. 事件日志项的 属性表示事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的完整32位资源标识符。The property for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 同一源中的两个事件日志项可以具有匹配的 值，但由于事件标识符的前两位存在差异，因此具有不同的 值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the event identifier. 如果应用程序使用 方法之一编写事件项，则 属性将与可选的 `eventId` 参数匹配。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果应用程序使用 或 Windows API `ReportEvent`写入事件，则 属性会与事件的资源标识符匹配，并将前两位屏蔽为 off。If the application wrote the event using or the Windows API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier for the event, with the top two bits masked off.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取该项在事件日志中的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of this entry in the event log.

value.span: 该项在事件日志中的索引。

span.span: The index of this entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数字不一定是从零开始的。This number is not necessarily zero-based.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceId As Long
public: property long InstanceId { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The instance ID for this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取指定事件项的消息文本的资源标识符。

span.span: Gets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

value.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的消息资源文件中的字符串定义对应。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string definition in the message resource file of the event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性唯一地标识已配置事件源的事件条目。The property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source. 事件日志条目的 表示事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的完整32位资源标识符。The for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 属性等于具有被屏蔽的前两位的 。The property equals the with the top two bits masked off. 同一源中的两个事件日志项可以具有匹配的 值，但由于资源标识符的前两位存在差异，因此具有不同的 值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the resource identifier. 如果应用程序使用 方法之一编写事件项，则 属性将与可选的 `eventId` 参数匹配。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果应用程序使用 写入事件，则 属性将与 `instance` 参数的 中指定的资源标识符相匹配。If the application wrote the event using , the property matches the resource identifier specified in the of the `instance` parameter. 如果应用程序使用 Windows API `ReportEvent`写入事件，则 属性将与 `dwEventID` 参数中指定的资源标识符相匹配。If the application wrote the event using the Windows API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier specified in the `dwEventID` parameter. 有关定义事件消息和生成事件日志资源文件的详细信息，请参阅[https://msdn.microsoft.com](https://msdn.microsoft.com/)上平台 SDK 文档中的 "消息编译器" 主题。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [https://msdn.microsoft.com](https://msdn.microsoft.com/). 有关事件日志标识符的详细信息，请参阅 Platform SDK 中的 "事件标识符" 主题。For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在事件日志中搜索具有特定资源标识符的条目。The following code example searches an event log for entries with a particular resource identifier. 此代码示例显示每个匹配项的事件消息，并计算日志中匹配项的总数。The code example displays the event message for each matching entry, and counts the total number of matching entries in the log. 每个条目的消息文本可能相同，也可能不相同;每个事件消息依赖于写入时使用的事件源消息文件、插入字符串和参数。The message text for each entry may or may not be the same; each event message depends on the event source message file, insertion strings, and parameters used when it was written. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取与该事件项关联的本地化消息。

span.span: Gets the localized message associated with this event entry.

value.span: 消息的格式化、本地化文本。

span.span: The formatted, localized text for the message.

value.span: 其中包含关联的替换字符串。

span.span: This includes associated replacement strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将打开注册表，以确定包含本地化文本的 .dll 文件的文件名。Getting this property opens the registry to determine the file name of the .dll file that contains the localized text. 如果在测试源代码时收到注册表错误，请验证计算机上是否存在该 .dll 文件。If you receive a registry error when testing your source code, verify that the .dll file exists on the computer. 如果消息中包含插入字符串，请在其分配中捕获错误。If insertion strings are included in the message, catch errors in their allocation.

exception.span: 未能为与消息关联的插入字符串之一分配空间。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the message.

public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ReplacementStrings { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与事件日志项关联的替换字符串。

span.span: Gets the replacement strings associated with the event log entry.

value.span: 包含存储在事件项中的替换字符串的数组。

span.span: An array that holds the replacement strings stored in the event entry.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Source As String
public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The source application of this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取生成该事件的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the application that generated this event.

value.span: 在事件日志中注册为该事件的源的名称。

span.span: The name registered with the event log as the source of this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示记录了哪些事件。The event source indicates what logged the event. 如果应用程序较大，则通常是应用程序的名称或应用程序的子组件的名称。It is often the name of the application or the name of a subcomponent of the application if the application is large. 应用程序和服务通常会写入到应用程序日志或自定义日志，并因此作为其源。Applications and services usually write to (and therefore are sources for) the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序通常会写入系统日志。Device drivers usually write to the System log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，`switch` 语句使用控制台输入搜索指定 的事件日志条目。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到匹配项，则会在控制台中显示 属性信息。If a match is found, the property information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeGenerated As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeGenerated { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取生成该事件的本地时间。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was generated.

value.span: 生成该事件的本地时间。

span.span: The local time at which this event was generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员保存事件的生成时间。This member holds the time that an event was generated. 这可能与事件信息写入事件日志的时间不同。This might not be the same as the time when the event information was written to the event log. 对于后者，请阅读 属性。For the latter, read the property. 生成事件的时间与记录事件的时间之间通常存在延迟。There is usually a lag between the time that an event is generated and the time it is logged. 了解事件的生成时间更重要，除非你想要查看日志记录是否存在明显的延迟。It is more important to know when the event was generated, unless you want to see if there is a significant lag in logging. 如果日志文件位于不同的服务器上并且遇到瓶颈，就会发生这种情况。That can happen if your log files are on a different server and you are experiencing a bottleneck.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeWritten As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeWritten { DateTime get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The time at which this event entry was written to the logfile.")

summary.span: 获取在日志中写入该事件的本地时间。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was written to the log.

value.span: 在日志中写入该事件的本地时间。

span.span: The local time at which this event was written to the log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员保存事件信息写入事件日志的时间。This member holds the time that an event's information is written to the event log. 这与生成事件时的时间可能不相同。This might not be the same time as when the event was generated. 对于后者，请阅读 属性。For the latter, read the property.

public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The name of a user associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取负责该事件的用户的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the user who is responsible for this event.

value.span: 唯一标识用户或组的安全标识符 (SID)。

span.span: The security identifier (SID) that uniquely identifies a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于除安全日志以外的日志中的事件，此属性通常为空白。This property is often blank for events in logs other than the Security log.

exception.span: 未能为用户的 SID 获取帐户信息。

span.span: Account information could not be obtained for the user's SID.
